entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
